tool_description: Validates building designs and modifications against relevant accessibility codes including ADA, local building codes, and international standards.

jurisdiction.description: Legal jurisdiction (city, state/province, country) where building is located

building_use.description: Primary building use classification (assembly, business, educational, factory, hazardous, institutional, mercantile, residential, storage, utility)

applicable_standards.description: Standards to check against (ADA, IBC, local_code, AODA, DDA, EN301549)

modification_type.description: Type of work being performed (new_construction, major_renovation, minor_modification, tenant_improvement)

budget_threshold.description: Project budget amount for determining alteration requirements

error_messages: Invalid jurisdiction: Provide a valid city, state/province, or country name
Invalid building use: Must be one of the specified building use classifications
Invalid occupancy load: Must be a positive integer between 1 and 50000
Invalid standards: Must include recognized accessibility standards
Invalid modification type: Must be one of new_construction, major_renovation, minor_modification, tenant_improvement
Invalid budget threshold: Must be a positive number if provided
usage: Specify the building location, use type, occupancy, relevant standards, and modification scope. The tool will return applicable code requirements and compliance thresholds.

compliance_report_id.description: Unique identifier for this compliance check

alteration_thresholds.description: Budget or scope thresholds that trigger additional requirements

permit_requirements.description: Whether building permits are required for this work
